events.name: Community Chess Club of Rochester Wednesday Night chess!
events.venue: History: Our chess club has been hosting chess players for over 60 years. During this time, thousands of USCF-rated chess games have been played, and countless unrated chess games have been played (e.g. Blitz, Simultaneous exhibitions, etc.). Weekly club meetings are held at the Rochester Chess Center located at 221 Norris Drive, Rochester, NY 14610; Phone: (585) 442-2430. We welcome all chess players & curious visitors. Currently, we have chess players of all ages with USCF ratings from beginner to Master strength. All are welcome.

events.name: Spring Hill Weekly Chess-Off
events.venue: Spring Hill Weekly Chess-Off Just Roll With It! Cards and Games weekly on Sunday, starting from Sunday, December 28, 2025, forever Event Overview Join the Spring Hill Chess Scene! Weekly USCF-rated tournaments hosted at Just Roll With It! Cards & Games in Spring Hill, TN. All ages and skill levels welcome — from beginners to experts. Format: - G/25; +5 - USCF-rated - One section (Open) - Bring board and clock if available (some provided) Schedule & Entry: - Sundays @ 6 PM - Entry Fee: $20 - 70% of entry fees returned as prizes - Estimated $140 prize pool with 10 players - Payouts based on final turnout Location: 2001 Campbell Station Pkwy, Ste C11, Spring Hill, TN 37174 Contact: Jared — Text (909) 725-9605 for questions Address: 2001 Campbell Station Pkwy Ste C11, Spring Hill, TN 37174 United States Prize Fund: 70% of entry fee; split 50% 1st/30% 2nd/20% 3rd

events.name: 10th annual Southwest Class Blitz Championship (Sunday Night)
events.venue: 4-SS, G/3 d2, double round (8 games), Westin Dallas Fort Worth Airport Hotel, 4545 W John Carpenter Freeway, Irving, TX 75063. Free parking, free airport shuttle. $500 guaranteed prizes: $150-100, top Under 2300 $72, Under 2000 $70, Under 1700/Unr. $60, Under 1400 $48. Entry fee: $20, no checks. GMs $20 from prize. Enter at site Sun. night only before 9:10 pm. Round 1 begins 9:30 pm, then ASAP, should end by about 11:30 pm. One pair of half-point byes allowed in any round, must commit before round 2. February ratings used. Blitz rated (will not affect regular ratings); higher of Regular or Blitz used for pairings and prizes. $10 service charge for refunds before Rd. 1 pairings (no refunds after Round 1 is paired). No equipment supplied.
